argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psrcnrg.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 2 |  | psrcnrg.i | |- ( ph -> I e. V ) |
| 3 |  | psrcnrg.r | |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) |
| 4 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_psrring | |- ( ph -> S e. Ring ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` S ) = ( mulGrp ` S ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mgpbas | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` S ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` S ) = ( .r ` S ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_mgpplusg | |- ( .r ` S ) = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` S ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( .r ` S ) = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) |
| 14 | 7 | #P_ringmgp | |- ( S e. Ring -> ( mulGrp ` S ) e. Mnd ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( mulGrp ` S ) e. Mnd ) |
| 16 | 2 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> I e. V ) |
| 17 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } |
| 19 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> x e. ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> y e. ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 21 | 3 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> R e. CRing ) |
| 22 | 1, 16, 17, 18, 11, 8, 19, 20, 21 | #P_psrcom | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> ( x ( .r ` S ) y ) = ( y ( .r ` S ) x ) ) |
| 23 | 10, 13, 15, 22 | #P_iscmnd | |- ( ph -> ( mulGrp ` S ) e. CMnd ) |
| 24 | 7 | #P_iscrng | |- ( S e. CRing <-> ( S e. Ring /\ ( mulGrp ` S ) e. CMnd ) ) |
| 25 | 6, 23, 24 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) |
